Html:
Hello there. I am new to GoblinXNA, but i am pretty familiar with XNA itself. I have the latest XNA Game Studio installed (4.0). When i am trying to Release compile Alvarwrapper.dll, i am getting the obvious errors. All of the headers (*.h):

include "MarkerDetectorWrapper.h"
include "MultiMarker.h"
include "FernImageDetector.h"
include "FernPoseEstimator.h"

are missing. I've tried to look for those headers everywhere but i didn't managed to find any. Any suggestions on this strange topic? THX in advance!

I am woking with:
VS 2010 Premium, OpenCV 2.4.0, GoblinXNA 4.1, XNA 4.0, ALVAR 2.0.

Hello there. I am new to GoblinXNA, so plz help me I have the latest XNA Game Studio installed (4.0). When i am trying to Release compile Alvarwrapper.dll, i am getting the obvious errors. All of the headers (*.h):

include "FernImageDetector.h"

are missing. I've tried to look for those headers everywhere but i didn't managed to find any. Any suggestions on this strange topic? THX in advance!

I am working with:
VS 2010 Premium, OpenCV 2.4.0, GoblinXNA 4.1, XNA 4.0, ALVAR 2.0.

Hi please same problem
I use VS 2010 OpenCV and Alvar 2.0 - I read the installation guide no other idea - tried again - reinstall alvar open cv and xna too

Thanks
TOM
